casebody.data:
EARLY
v.
DURHAM DSS. No. 524PA05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 12, 2006. Lowell L. Siler, Deputy County Attorney, for County of Durham DSS. Patrice Walker, for Marsha A. Early.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of July 2006 by NC Association of County Commissioners for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(l). By order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of July 2006."
